name: Planet Destroyer
description:
PLANET DESTROYER - This is a classic puzzle 3 in a row. If you want to relax and stretch your brain, then you will definitely like this game.
Have you ever wondered how many planets are in the universe? In the PLANET DESTROYER game, you can become a kind of evil god, a planet destroyer, build identical planets 3 or more horizontally and vertically and destroy them under a pleasant space soundtrack, earn points and increase your status as a destroyer, move on to more difficult levels.
